preservingTheEnvironmentDesc: is a key challenge of our time. This includes reducing emissions and pollution, protecting biodiversity and creating sustainable lifestyles. To achieve this goal, comprehensive measures are needed at the national and global level, as well as innovations in recycling and support for sustainable consumption.
implementationOfInnovationsInTheFieldOfR: Implementation of innovations in the field of renewable energy

plays an important role in reducing dependence on traditional energy sources and the impact on the environment. The use of advanced technologies helps to improve the efficiency and reliability of renewable energy production, contributing to sustainable development and compliance with environmental standards.
recyclingOfSecondaryRawMaterialsDesc: Modern technologies make it possible to effectively use recycled materials to manufacture new products, which helps reduce the negative impact on the environment.
messageErrorNameInvalid: The name should contain only letters
messageErrorNameTooShort: The number of letters entered must be greater than 2
messageErrorNameTooLong: The number of letters entered should be no more than 20
messageErrorEmailTooLong: The number of characters entered should be no more than 30
messageErrorMessageTooShort: Message length is not less than 20 characters
messageErrorMessageTooLong: Message length is no more than 100 characters
aboutUsPrimaryText: unites the efforts of activists to promote a sustainable and environmentally friendly future. Through innovative technologies and collaboration with experts in resource recovery, we strive to reduce the negative impact of waste on our environment.
aboutUsOrganization: The organization is actively working to improve recycling technologies, involving specialists and businessmen, young people and the public.
aboutUsDevelops: Develops and implements recycling programs to reduce environmental pollution and promote the efficient use of resources. Waste becomes a source material for new, sustainable products, helping to preserve our environment.
aboutUsExplanatoryClasses: Conducts interactive explanatory classes among teenagers.
missionPrimaryText: Creating a space for innovative activity in the field of ecology and energy in order to form a country of conscious citizens. We see ourselves as a catalyst for positive change that brings together all stakeholders to implement projects for the development of local communities and sectors of the national economy, as well as to support innovative ideas in the fields of environment and energy.
missionHighStandardOfQuality: We strive for a high standard of quality in the implementation of our projects aimed at ensuring sustainable development and balanced use of natural resources.Our activities are focused on creating innovative solutions that not only promote efficient energy use, but also reduce the negative impact on the environment.
missionPowerOfIndividuals: We believe that combining the power of individuals, companies, and organizations from different industries can lead to integrated and revolutionary solutions to environmental and energy challenges. Stakeholders have a unique opportunity to collaborate and share ideas to improve our environment.
missionConsciousCivilSociety: Our mission is an integral part of building a conscious civil society where everyone can contribute to creating a sustainable and healthy future. We invite everyone who shares our belief in the power of positive change to join our community and contribute to the bigger picture of environmental and energy development.
titleGoalsSustainableDevelopment: Sustainable development through innovation, standardization and infrastructure progress
textGoalsSustainableDevelopment: We are committed to the development and implementation of advanced technologies that are energy efficient, environmentally friendly and comply with international standards. We aim to create an inclusive infrastructure that will ensure sustainable and responsible industrial growth, while contributing to the overall well-being of society. We strive to encourage and support startups aimed at solving environmental problems.
textEducationalWork: Disseminating useful information and educating citizens about environmentally responsible lifestyles is an important step in preserving the environment. By educating and informing citizens about environmental problems and possible solutions, it is possible to intensify the population's efforts to preserve nature. This helps to create national and global awareness of the need for careful treatment of natural resources.
textPartnership: Intensification of global partnership for sustainable development, protection of environmental, social and economic interests of society, provision of assistance to regions affected by environmental, energy disasters and conflicts to restore stability and preserve natural resources.
titleImproveTheEnvironmentalSituation: Active and collaborative work to improve the environmental situation
textImproveTheEnvironmentalSituation: Combining efforts to fight climate change, preserve biodiversity and improve the environmental situation in the country by actively cooperating with scientific institutions, government and public organizations.
textProfessionalism: Continuous improvement of professional skills and knowledge in accordance with modern standards.
textInnovation: Active implementation of innovative ideas and technologies in our work.
textResponsibility: Caring about the consequences of one's actions at the level of social and environmental responsibility.
textObjectivity: Ensuring a neutral and objective approach in all cases and decision-making.
textEcoConsciousness: We teach the principles of respect for nature and strive to create environmental awareness by organizing events and projects.
textIndependence: Ensuring independence in decision-making from external influences or interests.
textTransparency: Ensuring openness and accessibility of information for all stakeholders.
textSustainableDevelopment: Commitment to continuous development and adaptation to new challenges.
ourCommitmentDesc: We are committed not only to passing on knowledge, but also to inspiring children and young people to take action to preserve our environment. Understanding the inherent impact of human activity on the ecosystem, we work to create a balanced and environmentally sustainable world.
environmentalEducationItAllStartsWithKno: Environmental education: it all starts with knowledge

Our environmental education programmes for children and young people not only impart basic knowledge about nature conservation, but also inspire action. We develop young people's ability to understand ecosystems, use resources rationally and create innovative solutions to reduce their environmental impact.
greenInitiativesOfYoungPeopleDesc: We believe in the power of ideas and are committed to supporting young people in realising their green projects. Through our programmes and resources, we help young people create and implement innovative environmental ideas that contribute to sustainable development.
anInvitationToChangeDesc: We encourage children and young people to be agents of change. Our organisation is not only a platform for gaining knowledge, but also a community of enthusiasts who want to turn their ideas into reality. Join us, so that together we can bring environmental values to life and become partners in creating a green and sustainable world for our generation and the future.
forPreservationForTheFutureDesc: We believe that our work with children and young people not only creates an environmentally conscious generation, but also opens the door to a future where every step is environmentally responsible. Let's preserve nature together for those who will explore it tomorrow!
issuesDesc: Our organisation pays special attention to environmental protection, recognising the importance of our contribution to the preservation of the environment. We consider environmental issues to be an essential aspect of our business and recognise that we are directly responsible for the state of the environment.
innovationAsOneOfTheVectors: Innovation as one of the vectors
innovationAsOneOfTheVectorsDesc: Our initiatives focus on the use of innovative technologies and energy efficiency. We support the introduction of new technologies aimed at reducing emissions, optimising energy consumption and increasing the efficiency of renewable energy sources.
recyclingOfPlasticWasteDesc: We are actively working to support the recycling of plastic waste, using advanced technologies and processes to turn it into secondary materials and useful items, thereby helping to reduce the amount of waste and avoid its negative impact on the environment
commitmentToSustainableDevelopmentDesc: Our NGO is committed to sustainable development and environmental protection. We take into account international environmental standards and strive to exceed them, creating a balanced approach to solving environmental problems. Our goal is to restore and maintain ecosystems, as well as actively work to reduce waste and encourage the use of recycled materials as a key element in this process, in order to ensure sustainable development and preserve natural resources for future generations.
joinTheTeamDescFirst: Are you looking for an opportunity to join a group of people who really want to change the world for the better?
joinTheTeamDescSecond: The NGO «Platform of Eco-Energy Initiatives» is looking for you!
joinTheTeamDescThird: We bring together experts, professionals, and activists who want to make the world a more sustainable and environmentally friendly place to live.
whatWeOfferFirst: Participate in activities to conserve natural resources, reduce emissions and pollution, protect biodiversity and create a sustainable lifestyle.
whatWeOfferSecond: Participate in the development and implementation of recycling programmes to reduce environmental pollution and promote more efficient use of resources.
whatWeOfferThird: If you have any questions or would like to get involved, please contact us for more information
stepsTitle: There are just a few steps to join our team:
stepsDescFirstLink: Charter of the NGO «Platform of Eco-Energy Initiatives»
stepsDescSecondAfter: , which will be considered at the meeting of the Board of the NGO «Platform of Eco-Energy Initiatives».
stepsDescThirdAfter: to the processing of personal information
partnersDescFirst: We, the NGO «Platform of Eco-Energy Initiatives», invite you to join our mission of sustainable development and environmental protection.
partnersDescSecond: Your partnership is an opportunity to create real change in the world together.
supportInTransportDesc: You will have the opportunity to contribute to the transportation of materials, equipment, and recyclables for processing and production of new useful things.
expertSupportDesc: Are you an expert?  Your competence in eco-energy areas will be extremely important for organising and conducting seminars, lectures and other educational events for the community, youth and teenagers.
resourceExchangeDesc: We believe in the power of sharing ideas, resources and experience, and in this significant contribution to the implementation of our eco-energy, recycling and disposal initiatives.
deepImpactContinued: Together, we can do more by jointly implementing projects and initiatives to preserve the environment.
exchangeOfExperienceContinued: The partnership provides an opportunity to share best practices and innovations in the field of sustainable development.
raisingReputationContinued: We strive to become leaders in important eco-energy projects, recycling initiatives and waste reduction. We believe that our active involvement in educating and promoting the idea of separate waste collection as a way of life will enhance our reputation and contribute to our sustainability goals.
memorandumFirst: We believe in the power of collective action and are open to anyone who wants to join our movement. Together we can change the world, making it cleaner and more sustainable for future generations.
memorandumSecond: Thank you for your interest and consideration of our invitation to partnership. Please do not hesitate to contact us and together we will make a meaningful contribution to the preservation of our planet. Link to the
volunteersFirst: Are you looking for an opportunity to join a team of people who want to make the world a better place to live? The NGO «Platform of Eco-Energy Initiatives» needs you!
volunteersSecond: We are looking for volunteers who are ready to join our initiatives in nature conservation, recycling and the introduction of renewable energy sources.
volunteersStepFirstLink: Regulations on volunteer activities in the field of providing free assistance of the NGO «Platform of Eco-Energy Initiatives»
volunteersStepFourth: Have an interview with the head of the volunteer department
treesDescFirst: Join us today and become part of this inspiring community!
treesDescSecond: Together we can make a real difference to the future of our planet.
founderOfTheOrganization: Founder and Chairman of the organization

aboutYevgenyBezkorovainy: He has a degree in economics. He has worked in various industries. He has extensive experience in strategic planning and forecasting of production processes. He has participated in many socio-economic youth projects. He is engaged in volunteer activities.
aboutIlonaGordienko: She holds a Master's degree in Accounting and Auditing, has 30 years of experience as a chief accountant in various fields of activity, is good at working with people, and is stress-resistant.
aboutTatianaBezkorovaina: He has a degree in economics. An experienced specialist with extensive experience in the development of international relations and academic mobility. Provides advisory and organizational support to academic staff, researchers and students in planning and developing international cooperation.
aboutMykolaGordienko: Has an incomplete higher legal education, knows how to work in a team, has experience in working with clients, participated in a fundraising project, and volunteers.
lawsOfUkraineRelatedToVolunteering: Laws of Ukraine Related to Volunteering
charitableActivitiesLaw: Law of Ukraine 'On Charitable Activities and Charitable Organizations'
